FindingName: Infected Files can be Downloaded through SharePoint
Description: SharePoint online allows files that Defender for Office 365 has detected as infected to be downloaded. This could lead to serious damage to your organization
Remediation: 1. Connect using Connect-SPOService, you will need to enter the URL for your Sharepoint Online admin page https://*-admin.sharepoint.com as well as a Global Admin account. > 2. Run the following Powershell command to set the value to True: Set-SPOTenant â€“DisallowInfectedFileDownload $true
